# Change default ssh host keys

= Introduction =

For security reasons, is highly recommeded that you replace the default *ssh host keys*.

= Details =

Anyone that download this image will know the ssh host keys content, doing this you'll create your unique ones

{{{
remountrw
rm /ro/etc/ssh/ssh_host_*
dpkg-reconfigure openssh-server
mv /rw/etc/ssh/ssh_host_* /ro/etc/ssh/
remountro
/etc/init.d/ssh restart
}}}
